reviewText:
Wonderful! I enjoyed THIS so much I felt it a
no-brainer in ordering the complete Blu-ray
( https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00F40UBM8 )
Collection that is blessed with several, optional,
different, language  sound tracks. In both cases,
only film number 7 isn't in MONO-sound.
this is must have if you like Comedy - very funny and you have to have all of them - they are all enjoyable.
GREAT VIDEOS. ALL THE POLICE ACADEMY VIDEOS ARE THE GREATEST AND FUNNIEST EVER. MICHEAL WINDSOL IS ONE OF THE BEST ACTORS.
